alert.note: Alert for Faulkner; Pulaski (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 5:11PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Faulkner and northwestern Pulaski Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 510 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pinnacle Mountain State Park, or near Maumelle, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Little Rock... North Little Rock... Sherwood... West Little Rock... Maumelle... Mayflower... Pinnacle Mountain State Park... Gibson... Morgan... Marche... Oak Grove in Pulaski County... Roland in Pulaski County... Little Italy... Chenal Valley... Camp Robinson... Cato... Palarm... Natural Steps... Ferndale... Saltillo... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
